articles.author: India Today Trending Desk
articles.title: Italian PM Giorgia Meloni welcomes delegates at G7 Summit with 'namaste' - India Today
articles.description: At the inaugural day of the G7 Summit Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni was seen welcoming European Union chief Ursula von der Leyen and German Chancellor Olaf Scholz with folded hands
articles.content:
Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni on Thursday welcomed several delegates and heads of government with a 'namaste' at the G7 (Group of Seven) Summit.
On the inaugural day of the summit, Meloni wa… [+1821 chars]
